Description.description: A description explaining the general purpose and domain of the action.

DeveloperName.description: The unique name for this object.

FullName.description: The full name of the associated object in Metadata API. The full name can include a namespace prefix.

InvocationTarget.description: Target invocation used by invocation operations.

InvocationTargetType.description: Invocable action types used by invocation operations.

IsConfirmationRequired.description: Indicates whether confirmation is required for this action.

IsIncludeInProgressIndicator.description: Indicates whether the ProgressIndicatorMessage is displayed.

Language.description: The language of the GenAiFunctionDefinition. The value for this field is the language value of the org.

MasterLabel.description: The master label for the generative AI action.

Metadata.description: Provides access to the associated type.

ProgressIndicatorMessage.description: Message displayed when an action is taking longer than expected to execute.

IsLocal.description: This field is a calculated field and is set to true if this action is an edited version of a standard action.

LocalDeveloperName.description: The unique name for this action within a topic.

ParentId.description: The ID of the object that owns the action.

PlannerId.description: The agent planner service for this action.

PluginId.description: The agent topic for this agent action.

Source.description: The optional source standard or custom action from which this action's configuration, including description, input, and output, is copied. If there's no value, the action is used only within the parent topic.
